name: retro-mode-switcher
title: 8-bit Retro Mode Switcher
description: A retro-styled theme toggle component with pixel art sun and moon icons. Perfect for 8-bit themed applications that need a nostalgic theme switcher.

files.content: "use client"; import { useTheme } from "next-themes"; import * as React from "react"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/8bit/button"; export function RetroModeSwitcher() { const { setTheme, resolvedTheme } = useTheme(); const toggleTheme = React.useCallback(() => { setTheme(resolvedTheme === "dark" ? "light" : "dark"); }, [resolvedTheme, setTheme]); return ( ); }
